mc.name: Alaborn Cavalier
mc.oracleText: Whenever Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may tap target creature.
mc.printedText: Whenever Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may tap target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Course he ran! I wouldn't want to stare down that barrel, either!"
--Alaborn soldier

mc.name: Armillary Sphere
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages--until now.

mc.name: Benalish Lancer
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.)
If Benalish Lancer was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.)
If Benalish Lancer was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.

mc.name: Bloodmark Mentor
mc.oracleText: Red creatures you control have first strike.
mc.printedText: Red creatures you control have first strike.
mc.flavorText: Boggarts divide the world into two categories: things you can eat, and things you have to chase down and pummel before you can eat.

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying

Flash
Flying
When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

mc.name: Bogardan Rager
mc.oracleText:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Bogardan Rager enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Bogardan Rager enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: In the erupting heart of Bogardan, it's hard to tell hurtling volcanic rocks from pouncing volcanic beasts.

mc.name: Breath of Darigaaz
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If Breath of Darigaaz was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If Breath of Darigaaz was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

mc.name: Captive Flame
mc.oracleText: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Kills and cooks your food in one easy stroke."

Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
mc.printedText:
Defender
When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
mc.flavorText:
"The smell of roasted flesh hung over the valley for hours."
--Onean sergeant

mc.name: Claws of Valakut
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control and has first strike.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control and has first strike.
mc.flavorText: "Swords may sunder. Shields may fail. My will is stronger than steel, and my flesh and bone far more deadly."

mc.name: Cone of Flame
mc.oracleText: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

mc.name: Dragon Fodder
mc.oracleText: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
mc.flavorText: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

mc.name: Dragon Whelp
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

mc.name: Dragon's Claw
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: Though no longer attached to the hand, it still holds its adversary in its grasp.

mc.name: Dragonspeaker Shaman
mc.oracleText: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
mc.printedText: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
mc.flavorText: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."

mc.name: Edge of Autumn
mc.oracleText:
If you control four or fewer lands, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
Cycling--Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
If you control four or fewer lands, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
Cycling--Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.flavorText: "At harvest are seeds of next year sown."

Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.

Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)

mc.printedText:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
{R}: Fire-Belly Changeling gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
mc.flavorText:
"My ears say it hisses. My fingers say it burns."
--Auntie Wort

Enchant creature

When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, put a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

mc.name: Harm's Way
mc.oracleText: The next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to target creature or player instead.
mc.printedText: The next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to target creature or player instead.
mc.flavorText: Even when fate is already written, there's always time to change the names.

mc.name: Henge Guardian
mc.oracleText: {2}: Henge Guardian gains trample until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {2}: Henge Guardian gains trample until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Like so many Thran relics, the wurm engine kept operating long after its creators were gone.

mc.name: Heroes' Reunion
mc.oracleText: Target player gains 7 life.
mc.printedText: Target player gains 7 life.
mc.flavorText:
"You helped save my people from a Phyrexian fate. Did you think I wouldn't return the favor?"
--Eladamri, to Gerrard

mc.name: Jaws of Stone
mc.oracleText: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast Jaws of Stone.
mc.printedText: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast Jaws of Stone.
mc.flavorText: When giants find their mountain homes infested, they have a whole range of solutions.

mc.name: Juniper Order Ranger
mc.oracleText: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.
mc.printedText: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.
mc.flavorText: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

mc.name: Kinsbaile Cavalier
mc.oracleText: Knight creatures you control have double strike.
mc.printedText: Knight creatures you control have double strike.
mc.flavorText: Ambidexterity is common among kithkin. The thoughtweft links the minds of the left- and right-handed, giving each the knack of the other.

mc.name: Knight Exemplar
mc.oracleText:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

mc.printedText:
First strike
Other Knight creatures you control get +1/+1 and are indestructible.
mc.flavorText: "If you think you are brave enough to walk the path of honor, follow me into the dragon's den."

mc.oracleText:
First strike
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
mc.printedText: First strike, lifelink
mc.flavorText: "By tradition, we don't speak for two days after battle. If our deeds won't speak for themselves, what else could be said?"

mc.name: Knight of the White Orchid

First strike

mc.printedText:
First strike
When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Both guide and guard on open plain.

mc.name: Knotvine Paladin
mc.oracleText: Whenever Knotvine Paladin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each untapped creature you control.
mc.printedText: Whenever Knotvine Paladin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each untapped creature you control.
mc.flavorText:
"He is part of a new breed of guardian, one who embraces the best of both his world and ours."
--Mayael the Anima

mc.name: Leonin Skyhunter
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: The skyhunters were born when the first leonin gazed at the heavens and wished to hunt the birds overhead.

mc.name: Lionheart Maverick
mc.oracleText:
Vigilance
{4}{W}: Lionheart Maverick gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Vigilance
{4}{W}: Lionheart Maverick gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Your signet is no symbol of power. It marks only your need for numbers to aid you. What do you do, guild-rat, now that you face my blade alone?"

mc.name: Loxodon Warhammer
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink. (If the creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker. Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

mc.printedText: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."
--Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

mc.printedText: Flying, first strike

mc.printedText: Exile target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.

mc.printedText: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

mc.printedText: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
mc.flavorText:
"Life up here is simple. Adapt to the ways of the mountains and they will reward you. Fight them and they will end you."
--Kezim, prodigal pyromancer

Flying

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature

mc.name: Sigil Blessing
mc.oracleText: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+3 and other creatures you control get +1/+1.
mc.printedText: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+3 and other creatures you control get +1/+1.
mc.flavorText: "For unwavering commitment and unflinching strength, the Order of the White Orchid confers its sigil. Rise, knight-captain, and do your duty."

mc.name: Silver Knight
mc.oracleText: First strike, protection from red
mc.printedText: First strike, protection from red
mc.flavorText: "Hammer out your doubts as you forge your weapon. To slay a dragon, your resolve must be stronger than your steel."

mc.name: Skirk Prospector
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
"I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die."
--Braids, dementia summoner

mc.name: Skyhunter Patrol
mc.oracleText: Flying, first strike (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and it deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
mc.printedText: Flying, first strike
mc.flavorText:
"We leonin have come to rule the plains by taking to the skies."
--Raksha Golden Cub

mc.name: Spidersilk Armor
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control get +0/+1 and have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Creatures you control get +0/+1 and have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)
mc.flavorText: It hardly weighs anything, but it takes all day to remove.

mc.name: Spitting Earth
mc.oracleText: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
mc.printedText: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
mc.flavorText:
"Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."
--Kumano, to his pupils

mc.name: Steward of Valeron

Vigilance
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Vigilance
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Knight-stewards guard the Sun-Dappled Court, a grove of immense, sculptured olive trees that represent Valeron's twelve noble families.

mc.name: Temporary Insanity
mc.oracleText: Untap target creature with power less than the number of cards in your graveyard and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Untap target creature with power less than the number of cards in your graveyard and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

mc.name: Test of Faith
mc.oracleText: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, and put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.
mc.printedText: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, and put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.
mc.flavorText: Those who survive the test bear a mark of power anyone can recognize.

mc.name: Thunder Dragon
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Thunder Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Thunder Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying.
mc.flavorText: Sometimes primitive cultures attributed natural phenomena to monsters. Sometimes they were right.

Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.

{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.

mc.oracleText:
Flying
Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
When Voracious Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature or player equal to twice the number of Goblins it devoured.

Flying
Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
When Voracious Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature or player equal to twice the number of Goblins it devoured.

mc.name: White Knight
mc.oracleText:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
mc.printedText: First strike, protection from black
mc.flavorText: Out of the blackness and stench of the engulfing swamp emerged a shimmering figure. Only the splattered armor and ichor-stained sword hinted at the unfathomable evil the knight had just laid waste.

mc.name: Wilt-Leaf Cavaliers
mc.oracleText: Vigilance
mc.printedText: Vigilance
mc.flavorText: Every elf in Shadowmoor is charged from birth with a terrible duty: to strike back against the ugliness and darkness, even though they are all around and seemingly without end.

mc.name: Zhalfirin Commander
mc.oracleText:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground."
--Sidar Jabari
